org.jetel.hadoop.service.mapreduce

Interface HadoopMapReduceService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HadoopConnectingMapReduceService

    public interface HadoopMapReduceService

    Service that allows to send map/reduce job specifications to the Hadoop cluster (specifically to jobtracker of the cluster) where the jobs specified are executed.

    This service is only intended to be used by end clients and it abstracts from details of connecting to the cluster. Clients using instances of this interface are expected not to possess nor need information regarding which cluster are the job sent to. Clients assume that this service is always able to send jobs specifications (it is connected).

    Since:
    rel-3-4-0-M2
    See Also:
    HadoopConnectingService, HadoopConnectingMapReduceService

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HadoopJobReporter sendJob(HadoopMapReduceJob job, java.util.Properties additionalJobSettings)
      Sends map/reduce job specified by parameters of this method to Hadoop cluster where it is executed.

    • Method Detail

      • sendJob

        HadoopJobReporter sendJob(HadoopMapReduceJob job,
                        java.util.Properties additionalJobSettings)
                          throws java.io.IOException

        Sends map/reduce job specified by parameters of this method to Hadoop cluster where it is executed. This method does not block. Job executed on cluster asynchronously but can be monitored using returned HadoopJobReporter.

        Implementors should ensure that additional job settings specified by parameter do not take priority to connection settings contained in job parameter. That is by default if the same setting is specified by both parameters then value specified by job overrides this that of additionalJobSettings. However this behaviour can be changed by implementors if desired.

        Parameters:
        job - Non-null specification of the job to be executed.
        additionalJobSettings - Non-null additional job settings represented as pairs of Hadoop API specific keys and corresponding values.
        Returns:
        A utility that allows to monitor and track sent job. May never return null.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If communication with the cluster (specifically the jobtracker) fails while sending specification of the job or if the job configuration specified causes the job to fail.
